content.text:
# Haridwar University

}}
Haridwar University (HU), formerly Roorkee College of Engineering, is a state private university located at Roorkee, Uttarakhand, India. The university is located at Roorkee on the Roorkee Haridwar Canal Road.
The university offers various courses in engineering & technology, computer science, management, paramedical, agriculture, commerce, business Studies, health sciences, arts & humanities and graduate studies.
Department
Haridwar University Roorkee has 10 academic departments covering engineering, management programs, agriculture and master of technology programs.
;Departments
*Civil Engineering
*Computer Engineering
*Electrical and Electronics Engineering
*Mechanical Engineering
*Electronics and Communication Engineering
*Management Studies
*Applied Science and Humanities
*Masters of Technology
*Computer science Engineering
*Electronics and Communication Engineering
* Agriculture
* Forestry
* Nursing
* Pharmacy
